reviews_data.review_text: Fantastic book selection!
Wonderful customer service.  Great selection.  Very clean and well stocked.
This store is amazing. I want to live here

We attended your Worriers cats event today and were very disappointed.  My child got ready, made a costume, and they voted for a girl who brought her relatives, who voted for her.  I think the rules need to be spelled out.  I also tried to find one thing, I asked two employees, and everyone just pointed out where to go, and only on the third attempt did the young man help me find it.  Complete disappointment, I won't come here again. I'm totally disappointed...
So clean and organized! Everyone is always so friendly and helpful when we visit. Bonus points because it has a Starbucks inside.
They have a huge selection, and now I don't have to go in Concord Mills with the way it's gotten to find a good book!
Nice place to read or work!

This is really quite a beautiful store. Everything is laid out in bright cubicles with large genre headers, rather than long rows, so from anywhere in the store you can look up and quickly find what you're looking for. The shelves were laid out in a pleasing way so that things could easily catch your eye. The staff was very eager and enthusiastic to help. I'm really glad there is a book store besides B-A-M should my local shop not have what I need.
Great displays. Well organized. Good seating! Great ambiance
Love B&N, my slice of heaven
One of the best ones that I have visited. A lot of variety.

Such a nice Barnes and Noble! My son and I love to visit and browse the children's section. My only complaint is the lack of adult African-American fiction available, I was unable to find any of the books I was looking for although other locations had the titles available (I live in Concord, so it would've been nice if at least a few of the titles were available here)
New store, lots of books, a good place for kids.

Nice store needs more technology books like how huntersville has it . Also staff is nice but we got told store is about to close 30+ minutes before closing time like 4 times by different staff members felt like we were being rushed
It was nice
Gorgeous store and layout! Friendly and helpful staff. Great selection lots of hardbacks and a large section for unique gifts. Highly recommend
It was difficult to find assistance, but this new store is beautiful! It has a modern design where many of the books are displayed showing the covers.
I love this place. Huge book selection! Everything looks well organized and clean.

I have to say that this is one of the best B&N's that I've visited. It's a brand-new store with a lot to discover and explore. The store is so bright and aesthetically pleasing with its design. I could have stayed there all day. The staff was pleasant, from the Cafe to the Front of the bookstore, and throughout. Nice atmosphere for a casual day of reading, or a new place to work.

The most incredible surprise to find this brand new, beautifully-designed, Barnes & Noble bookstore in Concord.
It's truly breathtaking!

Immediately upon walking in, I noticed the bright, clearly labeled genres & the layout feels like you are in little boutiques within a big store.

I always gravitate towards the sweet literary inspired gift items and the beautiful paper products. Trust me when I tell you buying that gorgeous paper to wrap that special gift is worth it! I've done it many times and people have not forgotten how I presented their gifts. A few of my friends and family have actually saved the paper.

This store is nicely laid out!
Although my son is grown, I checked out the children's area. It's a delight!
And the cafe is large and well-lit.

Booklovers, families, you will spend at least an hour here. Meet for play dates, besties, this will be your new hangout!

Check out my pics/videos and follow me here on Google Maps as I explore and contribute.

I have a huge trip to Washington DC, coming up in mid to late May, 2024.

Enjoy!
Josephine
I just walked in to check out this particular Barnes and Noble.  The book selection is A++++.  It was also nice and quiet.
Cool layout. Friendly staff. Fun experience

Well couldn't  wait til this store opened. I walked in to an absolute  beautiful  black authors i was very impressed.  Talking to Matthew  which gave excellent. Customer service  i am completely  happy with this store. Impressed  with Matthew  conversation  and taking information  ab a book we are looking for.
Congratulations  Barnes and noble i love this store.
No more Huntersville  for me with there lousy Customer service.
I am a customer service mgr

So happy B&N opened in Concord. It's a beautiful store and the staff is great. My only complaint is the lack of magazines, 1/5 of other B&N selections. Especially the art magazines. Almost none. I think today is the first time I've left a B&N without purchasing anything. I guess I'll have to continue to drive to Birkdale for my monthly B&N fix.

If you're not interested in magazines, this is an excellent B&N.
Friendly staff beautiful store
Beautiful store, had a pretty good selection and deals, glad they came to Concord! Definitely will be back.

Clean brand new Barnes & Noble with a refreshed design. Great layout that makes efficient use of its smaller than average square footage. A fantastic addition to the area and especially this shopping center.

For the grand opening, everyone was super helpful and looking to make sure everyone was able to find the books they were interested in. As you'd hope. However cashier Meghann was a highlight as she was very accommodating towards my elderly grandparents while totaling their mountain of cooking & coloring books.

Glad to have a new bookstore in the area to check whenever the new releases I have my eye on arrive on store shelves.
